HOME_PAGE_MESSAGE_1: Welcome ! You are connected to the interactive frontage of the Bordeaux University A1 building :
HOME_PAGE_MESSAGE_2: . 71 colorful pixels enlight all the building windows.
HOME_PAGE_MESSAGE_3: By using this app, you will be able to pick which colors are displayed on the frontage, to play your childhood games such as Tetris, Snake and more, or even learn to program during special events
HOME_PAGE_HREF_MESSAGE: check the date of the next workshop
FLAGS_DESCRIPTION: A flag is a piece of fabric (most often rectangular or quadrilateral) with a distinctive design that is used as a symbol, as a signaling device, or as decoration.
RANDOMFLASHING_DESCRIPTION: Random page is a link which will automatically (and randomly) take you to any page
SWEEPASYNC_DESCRIPTION: These may be outside events such as the arrival of signals, or actions instigated by a program that take place concurrently with program execution, without the program blocking to wait for results.
SWEEPRAND_DESCRIPTION: Random page is a link which will automatically (and randomly) take you to any page
SNAKE_DESCRIPTION: Come back to your childhood with wonderful cult historical snaky game !
